mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chaconne / G.F. Händel ; revised and edited by G. Rabenau
Handel, George Frideric, 1685-1759. Chaconnes, harpsichord. HWV 435, G major
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Handel, George Frideric, 1685-1759
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For piano solo; originally composed for harpsichord.
Publication date derived from publisher's address. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro.
"Stich und Druck der Röder'schen Officin in Leipzig."
Advertisement on p. [14]: The Vienna Conservatory edition of the pianoforte classics.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Vienna Conservatory edition of the pianoforte classics / revised and edited by the Professors J. Dachs, A. Door, J. Epstein etc. G.F. Händel
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Chaconnes (Piano)
